sig_info: Heavy Attacks have a 15 to 35.04% chance per active Gadget Debuff to inflict a Taunt Debuff for 0 seconds.
Striking a Taunted opponent with Skateboard Attacks grants a permanent Fury Buff, increasing Attack by 8.3 to 16.61. Max 10 stacks. When Knocked Down these Buffs are lost.
After being Knocked Down Night Thrasher has a 25 to 50% chance to Purify all Debuffs.

PASSIVE: Night Thrasher’s advanced combat suit grants him immunity to Incinerate effects and 533.33 Physical Resistance.
Night Thrasher gains +66.67 Critical Damage Rating for each Unique Debuff on his opponent. This ability is not affected by Ability Accuracy Reduction.
Well Timed Blocks and successful Dodges grant 5% of max Power while Night Thrasher is under 1 Bar of Power.
SKATEBOARD ATTACKS: Champions of the Contest never see the skateboard coming. Attacks using the skateboard have passive True Accuracy.
ON OPPONENT KNOCKDOWN: Refresh the duration of all active Gadget Debuffs.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Night Thrasher uses the Shock Baton to inflict Shock dealing 33.2 Energy Damage over 12 seconds.

If this attack is activated after striking with a Light Attack, Night Thrasher instead uses the Smoke Capsule Gadget, inflicting Disorient. Disorient reduces Enemy Defensive Ability Accuracy by 50% and lowers the opponent’s Block Proficiency by 50% for 12 seconds.

If this attack is activated after striking with a Medium Attack, Night Thrasher instead uses the Explosive Gadget inflicting Incinerate, removing Perfect Block Chance, decreasing the opponent’s Block Proficiency by 50% and dealing 33.2 Energy Damage over 12 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Grant Night Thrasher a Precision Buff increasing Critical Rating by 177.78 for each Unique Debuff effect on the opponent for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Passive Debilitate, extending the duration of all Debuffs by 75% for 45 seconds.
Refresh all active Gadget Debuffs with the extended duration.

If this attack is activated after striking with a Light Attack, Night Thrasher instead uses the Smoke Capsule Gadget, inflicting Disorient. Disorient reduces Enemy Defensive Ability Accuracy by 50% and lowers the opponent’s Block Proficiency by 50% for 12 seconds.

If this attack is activated after striking with a Medium Attack, Night Thrasher instead uses the Explosive Gadget inflicting Incinerate, removing Perfect Block Chance, decreasing the opponent’s Block Proficiency by 50% and dealing 920.4 Energy Damage over 12 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Grant Night Thrasher a Precision Buff increasing Critical Rating by 233.33 for each Unique Debuff effect on the opponent for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Passive Debilitate, extending the duration of all Debuffs by 75% for 45 seconds.
Refresh all active Gadget Debuffs with the extended duration.

sig_info: Heavy Attacks have a 15 to 35% chance per active Gadget Debuff to inflict a Taunt Debuff for 0 seconds.
Striking a Taunted opponent with Skateboard Attacks grants a permanent Fury Buff, increasing Attack by 181 to 361.99. Max 10 stacks. When Knocked Down these Buffs are lost.
After being Knocked Down Night Thrasher has a 25 to 50% chance to Purify all Debuffs.

PASSIVE: Night Thrasher’s advanced combat suit grants him immunity to Incinerate effects and 683.33 Physical Resistance.
Night Thrasher gains +85.42 Critical Damage Rating for each Unique Debuff on his opponent. This ability is not affected by Ability Accuracy Reduction.
Well Timed Blocks and successful Dodges grant 5% of max Power while Night Thrasher is under 1 Bar of Power.
SKATEBOARD ATTACKS: Champions of the Contest never see the skateboard coming. Attacks using the skateboard have passive True Accuracy.
